name: Hollow Candy Hunt
description:
CONTROLS: "A" + "D" to rotate, "Spacebar" to launch the toy rocket.

There was a Halloween game jam and instead of participating, I made a Halloween-themed game myself to have no creative limitations whatsoever. I also wanted to do it solo, so I could practice on my own, at my own pace.

I enjoyed every second of it and I hope you enjoy my game as well! 

Feel free to leave some appreciation and know that you can follow me on YouTube and Sketchfab as well!

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4ziYYQzrhWABr4uoNalxYw

https://sketchfab.com/ThomasBoone/models

Disclaimer: I do not own any of the rights regarding the sound/music files that were used. All rights go to their respective owners.
